---
name: Wiki
about: For issues concerning the wiki itself. Note that the issue board is not for general help. Please head over to the forums (https://osu.ppy.sh/community/forums) for that.

---

Add a sentence or two describing the issue in plain english (or leave empty if the title is self-explanatory).

Keep in mind this only refers to issues on Wiki articles, general help issues will be closed automatically.
